item.title: Now Powered by Outlines
item.description: Now Powered by Outlines One of the things that I do every so often is completely re-write the backend of my blog. I’ve mostly hit upon a UI that I like, but I’ve swapped out the backend over the years between various custom iterations, wordpress, ghost, and now finally Hugo. This time, I’ve swapped out how I write my blog posts - but kept everything else the same. The current system allows me to write markdown in vim.
